mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date ) VALUES ( seq_product_prod_no.nextval, #{prodName}, #{prodDetail}, #{manuDate:VARCHAR}, #{price}, #{fileName:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.prod_detail, p.manufacture_day, p.price, p.image_file, p.reg_date, NVL(t.tran_status_code, 0) FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no(+) AND p.prod_no = #{value}
